name: tough guy!
summary: An aggressive and martial arts-devoted mantis kicks cans and hunts down cicadas, bringing havoc into the life of a couple of humans.
info:
• 上映年度: 2005
  • 片长: 7分钟
  • 官方网站: An aggressive and martial arts-devoted mantis kicks cans and hunts down cicadas, bringing havoc into the life of a couple of humans.
  • 制作: 岸本真太郎
